footer.brandDescription: Installation and maintenance of premium terrace furniture on the French Riviera

hero.title: THE EXPERT IN LOGISTICS & TERRACE CLEANING
hero.subtitle: Specialist in winterization, furniture storage and restoration. Services from Monaco to Cannes.
hero.tagline: "Focus on your customers, TERRASCAPE takes care of the rest."

items.title: High-Pressure Cleaning
items.description: Floor stripping, awning cleaning and kitchen restoration. Solutions meeting hygiene standards for restaurants.

items.title: Winterization & Furniture Storage Management
items.description: Don't waste space anymore. We handle pickup, secure storage and inventory of your parasols, deck chairs and tables during off-season.

items.title: Event Setup & Logistics
items.description: Installation of temporary terraces and furniture handling for your parties and events on the French Riviera.

about.title: More than a service, a partner in the shadows.
about.description1: Terrascape was born from a requirement: to offer establishments on the French Riviera impeccable logistics.
about.description2: We are the invisible hands that make your terraces perfect, every day.

contact.title: Ready to elevate your establishment?
contact.subtitle: Free quote and response within 24 hours.

hero.title: OUR EXPERTISE
hero.subtitle: A tailored solution for every need of your establishment.

items.title: Management & Logistics
items.subtitle: Installation, Storage & Winterization.
items.description: Precise management of your furniture for smooth openings and closings.

items.title: Cleaning & Hygiene
items.subtitle: Floor, window and surface restoration.
items.description: A 5-star cleanliness standard to ensure customer experience from the first glance.

items.title: Events & Beaches
items.subtitle: Temporary setup & Event logistics.
items.description: Transformation of your spaces for private events or the summer season.

callToAction.title: Need a custom solution?
callToAction.description: We adapt our services to your establishment's reality. Let's discuss your constraints.

mission.title: Setting the stage for your success.
mission.paragraph1: Terrascape was born from a simple observation: daily establishment management (installation, cleaning, handling) weighs heavily on your teams. Between customer service and food quality, logistics often takes a back seat.
mission.paragraph2: We are not just external contractors. We are the partner who ensures your establishment is impeccable at opening: degreased floors, clean windows, terrace set up to the millimeter and furniture ready to welcome guests.
mission.quote: "Your job is to serve. Ours is to prepare your work tool."

values.title: Reliability
values.description: We are there, rain or shine, even at 5am.

values.title: Discretion
values.description: Silent intervention, impeccable appearance. Your customers don't see us, they see the result.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: Attention to detail is our standard. Nothing is left to chance.

intervention.title: SERVICE AREA
intervention.description: Our technical teams intervene 7 days a week, day and night, to ensure your service rotation. Total responsiveness, from Monaco to Cannes, for restaurants, hotels and private beaches.

hero.title: LET'S TALK ABOUT YOUR PROJECT.
hero.subtitle: A question? A quote? Our team is here to listen.

contact.title: Our Contact Information
contact.zoneDescription: We come directly to your site.

form.title: Send us a message
form.successMessage: Message sent successfully! We will contact you within 24 hours.
form.errorMessage: An error occurred. Please try again or call us directly.

items.question: Do you work on Sundays?
items.answer: Yes, we provide 7-day service, including holidays for seasonal establishments. We know your business doesn't stop.

items.question: What is your service area?
items.answer: Our main area extends from Monaco to Cannes, including Antibes, Juan-les-Pins, Nice, Villefranche-sur-Mer and Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat.

items.question: Do you only do cleaning?
items.answer: No, we offer complete management: morning setup (tables, chairs, parasols), evening storage, high-pressure cleaning, and even event decoration.

service_gestion.objective: Ensure a perfectly arranged, clean terrace ready to welcome your customers, without mobilizing your staff.

service_nettoyage.objective: Ensure an impeccable hygiene standard for your terraces and outdoor spaces, without mobilizing your staff.

guarantee.title: Our Quality Commitment
items: Tailor-made service according to your needs

service_events.objective: Transform your spaces for private events or the summer season, turnkey.
